App description:
SHOWTIME ANYTIME is available on your Oculus Quest at no additional cost as part of your existing SHOWTIME subscription through participating providers. To sign in to the SHOWTIME ANYTIME app use the username/password you received from your provider and stream SHOWTIME.

hollmrlJun 24, 2019 at 9:05 AM
Cannot Activate Quest Devices

Their Website will not allow Quest devices to be activated. It lists various device options, but Quest is not listed. A case where one side of Showtime does not know what the other side is doing. They need to add Quest as a activation option on their Website. Will update review when problem is corrected.

Update: I also tried activating using the iPhone app with Xfinity, and Quest does not show up as an activation option. With an iPhone (IOS) you are not allowed to use Web based activation. Success from other people must be with Android devices or other service providers. Cannot tell if this is a Showtime issue, Apple App issue or Xfinity issue, but I Still cannot activate.

Update 2: You cannot activate using Xfinity (Comcast) because they do not support activation with Oculus devices. I upgraded my rating to reflect that, because I did not want to penalize Showtime for Xfinity issues.

JamesBVRJun 21, 2019 at 2:07 PM
Activate from a phone or tablet with app

Works fine if you activate with the Showtime Anytime app on a tablet or phone. Just use Oculus as device to activate then enter the code displayed on the headset when you try to watch your first show or movie. The app itself works ok just wish we could have a way to see this in a larger screen environment like a cinema simulator. The influded Oculus video environment is ok but very limited. Please allow other environments and locations including void for example. Then it will be 5 stars.

Helpful | 6

jojasJun 21, 2019 at 10:18 AM
Works Perfectly

This app works perfectly. Just log in to your account on your phone app, go to menu, select activate devices, and pick oculus. Enter the code shown on the screen of the showtime headset app (enter code from the headset into your phone) and you are good to go. Thanks showtime!

Helpful | 5
